column4: hi guys .. how do I use irssi if i am behind a http proxy in my office
hi guys .. how do I use irssi if i am behind a http proxy in my office
yeah, but i dont have any other machine .. all i have is the office laptop
my desktop has been dead for ages
i have access to servers in my office .. but again they are behind the proxy
What does this proxy do? What does it block/allow?
yes
it iz :(
Do you know of any non-proxy ports that open to the web?
nopes
u mean that i can use internet through that proxy , but cant communicate with irc .. as it wont allow that traffic ?

I mean that if you MUST use that specific proxy to get to the internet, then there is a chance that the server is the only box in the whole company with internet access and everyone else is behind a mass firewall.
that is the case
Can you access https://www.google.com ?
i can, can access ftp as well
With or without proxy?
with proxy
tx for the help
Nisstyre65: Think httptunnel would work?
Nisstyre65: It works with corporate proxies to make an ssh connection
Nisstyre65: http://daniel.haxx.se/docs/sshproxy.html    -- "Withouth CONNECT" section
